subject: Baseball
Restoration and Rehabilitation
Hair
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In Hoboken, N.J., a charity mustache competition is part of an effort to refurbish a metal plaque that commemorates a baseball game played June 19, 1846.
snippet: In Hoboken, N.J., a charity mustache competition is part of an effort to refurbish a metal plaque that commemorates a baseball game played June 19, 1846.
